thread.title: Series preview: Tigers at White Sox
thread.title_full: Series preview: Tigers at White Sox - Chicago Tribune

author: chicagotribune.com
title: Series preview: Tigers at White Sox
text:
All games on WSCR-AM 670.
Season series: Tigers 9-7.
Friday: 7:10 p.m., CSN-plus.
RH Alfredo Simon (13-11, 5.18) vs. LH Chris Sale (12-11, 3.48).
Saturday: 6:10 p.m., WGN-9.
RH Justin Verlander (5-8, 3.39) vs. RH Erik Johnson (3-1, 3.45).
Sunday: 2:10 p.m., CSN.
LH Daniel Norris (2-2, 4.09) vs. RH Frankie Montas (0-1, 5.73).
Who's hot: Sale needs three strikeouts Friday to break Ed Walsh's 1908 Sox single-season strikeout record of 269. Jose Abreu entered Thursday one RBI away from becoming the second player in major-league history to record 30-plus homers and 100-plus RBIs in each of his first two seasons. Albert Pujols was the first. Verlander was 3-2 with a 3.27 ERA in six starts in September. Nick Castellanos was hitting .385 with three runs scored over his last seven games.
Who's not: Montas gave up six earned runs in three innings in his first major-league start, against the Tigers on Sept. 23. Avisail Garcia hit .196 with 10 RBIs and 23 strikeouts in 26 games in September. Anthony Gose was 4-for-22 with four runs scored and nine strikeouts over his last five games.
Privacy Policy Detroit Tigers Francellis Montas Chris Sale Justin Verlander Erik Johnson
